title: Crime Alert 01.13.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 01.13.20
description:
Would-be thief douses cop in hot coffee. Men glue numbers on lottery ticket and try to redeem it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
